children.content: Consider: Hip fracture, Pelvic fracture, Trochanteric fracture
Groin (or thigh) pain. Consider hip arthropathy: Degenerative, Infectious, Inflammatory, Avascular necrosis
Buttock pain. Consider: LS spine disease: OA, Disk disease with sciatica. SI joint disease: OA, Inflammatory. Ischial bursitis
Lateral pain. Working diagnosis: Trochanteric syndrome (bursitis or gluteus medius tendinitis)
